extendedInfo.description: This is the OFFICIAL application of the K-State Wildcats created by the CBSSports.com College Network, in partnership with the University. This exclusive sports application offers LIVE STREAMED games:************************************************************LIVE AUDIO*- Upgrade in the application to stream select games************************************************************* Audio is only available on certain compatible Android devices running OS2.2 or later. In order to access the audio please install the Sports Media Player in Google Play and re-launch this application.Annual Subscription $4.99ADDITIONAL APPLICATION FEATURES-	Live Scoring-	Play-by-Play-	Complete Sport Schedules-	Exclusive breaking sports news-	Video on demand-	Alerts (game start and final scores)-	Team and Coaches Rosters & Bios-	 Much moreâ¦COVERS ALL SCHOOL SPORTS!

reviews.title: No Live Auduo
reviews.comment: Live audio doesn\'t work with EVO 4G LTE.  I reported the issue and was told they were able to duplicate the problem.  It\'s been 3 weeks and no fix or follow up communicaton from developer.
reviews.author: Scott West

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Works great for me! Love it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wtf ?
reviews.comment: Crap
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No Audio
reviews.comment: I can\'t get the live streaming audio of the games to work on my Droid Incredible 4G LTE
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force close
reviews.comment: Locks up way too often.  Schedule isn\'t even close in any sport...its way behind on scores too...ESPN website is much faster and more accurate.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update ruined app.
reviews.comment: Nice work. This went from being the absolute best sport app to a pile of junk.  Who thought \"hey, we have links to every sport, schedule, count down to start, updated scores, and the ability to listen live on the internet. I know, let\'s get rid of all of that.\" Is there any way to revert back to the old version?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: NOT GOOD
reviews.comment: Was 5 until it updated. PLEASE STOP UPDATING YOUR MAKING THINGS WORSE
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 5 Stars, for now.
reviews.comment: I hit to give this app 5 stars (which I never do). Done really good for me so far, true test will be after this seasons football.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love
reviews.comment: Gives me great info and all I need to know about KSU sports!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: K-S-U, Wildcats!!!!!  Let\'s go K-State!
reviews.comment: Please leave the final score up at the completion of the football  games.  Great job with keeping up information on the basketball games.  Thank you!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Keeps me updated and always love it.

reviews.title: Recommended
reviews.comment: Good app!!!!

reviews.title: One of the better KSU apps.
reviews.comment: It locks up every once in a while, but is still the best KSU app on the market.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Alright
reviews.comment: Cool app just wish it were updated more often
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its all here!
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t matter what sport you enjoy, everyone is listed. Last season I enjoyed the live radio during football. Now I have iheartradio so there\'s no need to pay to listen on this app.
reviews.author: A Google User
